#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a%b==0)
	return b;
	else
	gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	long long int i,j,n,m,ev1,od1,ev2,od2,c,t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);	
	while(t--)
	{
		c=1;
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
		ev1= n/2;
		if(n%2==0)
		od1= n/2;
		else
		od1= (n/2)+1;
		ev2 = m/2;
		if(m%2==0)
		od2= m/2;
		else
		od2= (m/2)+1;
		j= ev1*od2 + ev2*od1;
		if(j!=0)
		c= gcd(n*m,j);
		printf("%lld/%lld\n",j/c,(n*m)/c);
		
	}
	return 0;
}
